name: Friendship Test
description:
Controls: Press & hold the buttons on the screen to control the characters. 

You can use the arrow keys and space bar to shoot, if you prefer. The buttons are mostly for mobile (yes, mobile works fine despite the warning about webGL)

Friendship mode: 

Create a 2 player online game by creating a unique code with the icons provided and choose "Create". You will play as Daniella.

Have a friend input the same code and choose "Join", they will be assigned the other character. They will play as Arina.

You will alternate your roles, shooter and target.

Sprite art: Maxenau

SFX: GuiNovi

Things that work: TomerSSH

Things that don't work: TomerSSH's evil twin

Made for the 2nd Game Grumps Game Jam

Please check out the other entries, as well as the ones from the first jam!
